lines: 1. Nterene riok'abaminto,Mang'an' obogimaNdore obosera bwaye,Mang'an' obogimaAmang'an' amaya,Nyegeri' okwegena.
2. Yes 'omuya otoeire,Mang'an'obogimaMonyabibe tegerera,Mang'an' obogimaOtoeire bosa,Tong'uswe gochia nka.
3. Tiga bono toyarandie,Mang'an' obogima'Korua kwabera, Morembe,Mang'an' obogimaYeso Omoboria,Tochene botambe.
